verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] , [V: facing] [ARG1: a blast of criticism for the detention of children separated from their immigrant parents at the U.S .- Mexico border] , was slated to meet with Republican lawmakers on Tuesday ahead of votes on immigration legislation .
